game.name: Mouse Hunt Runner
game.description:
A very little and cute mouse is in a big trouble! Can you help him out to get rid of the uninvited problem? Join Mouse Hunt Runner and be prepared to help your mouse friend to go on a most awaited adventure challenge! Mouse has accepted a challenge for running over the platform where lots of obstacles are waiting for him. She will be chased by a hungry cat regularly. So your job is to save him at any cost to help him win the award.

Use the arrow keys to guide your mouse to jump over the deadly cactuses, mouse traps and rocks and other obstacles! Try to consume all the cheese you see on his way to keep running without feeling the hungriness in this HTML5 platform game! The cat will catch him fast if he does not able to run properly due to being hungry. Every successful run will help you get a chance to open one of the three offered chests.

Do not forget to open it to get a bonus heart. Getting a floating cheese will help your mouse to run at an increased speed in this cool runner challenge! You will get another chance to run if your chest opens up with a heart. No worries if you do not find a heart in the opened chest. You will have unlimited chances to replay it at your convenience. Let us see how far you can go with this little creature in this mouse run challenge!
